item.title: AWS CloudWatch
item.description: info FYI AWS use “CloudWatch” in docs, “cloudwatch“ in cli/sdk, “monitoring” as the API endpoint, and “cloud-watch” in other service API calls like when setting flow logs for VPC, log_destination_type = “cloud-watch-logs” Custom log groups Now it’s possible to use a custom log group for a lambda function. Use this to send logs from multiple lambda functions to the same log group - each function gets it’s own log stream!
